net.cnri.repository.util

Class FastDateFormat.FormatSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cnri.repository.util.FastDateFormat.FormatSpec
  • Enclosing class:
    FastDateFormat

    public static class FastDateFormat.FormatSpec
extends java.lang.Object
    Specification of how to format a date.

    • Field Detail

      • ISO8601_MS

        public static final FastDateFormat.FormatSpec ISO8601_MS
        new FormatSpec("-","T",":",":",".",true,true);, e.g. 2012-11-02T23:39:05.346-05:00

      • ISO8601_NO_MS

        public static final FastDateFormat.FormatSpec ISO8601_NO_MS
        new FormatSpec("-","T",":",":",".",false,true);, e.g. 2012-11-02T23:39:05-05:00

    • Constructor Detail

      • FormatSpec

        public FormatSpec(java.lang.String dateSep,
                  java.lang.String dateTimeSep,
                  java.lang.String timeSep,
                  java.lang.String zoneSep,
                  java.lang.String decimalPoint,
                  boolean useMs,
                  boolean useZ)
        Constructs a format specification.
        Parameters:
        dateSep - separator between date and time, typically "-" or "".
        dateTimeSep - separator between date and time, typically "T" or " ".
        timeSep - separator between date and time, typically ":" or "".
        zoneSep - separator between hours and minutes of zone offset, typically ":" or "".
        decimalPoint - separator between seconds and milliseconds, typically ".", ",", or "".
        useMs - whether to include milliseconds.
        useZ - whether to specify the time zone +00:00 as "Z".
